Some Key features of KiteMan 

1.One Click Dashboard : In just one click you can see your whole portfolio from any tab.

2.Easy Research : Lot of out of box customized Research Solutions to get optimal result quickly.

3.Manage Watch List : You can sort your watch list, find top gainer/looser, do easy research, filter, etc.

4.One click to recovery loss calculator.

5.Get daily stock advice.

6.Get hand curated Business News only which that affects the market.
